hero.title: Ivorian Software Testing Committee
hero.description: The only official structure in Ivory Coast responsible for representing and promoting ISTQB®. We deliver ISTQB certifications, accredit trainers and actively participate in international software testing standards.

home.hero_title: The Only Official ISTQB Structure in Ivory Coast
home.hero_description: The Ivorian Software Testing Committee (CITL) was founded on October 24, 2025 at the ISTQB general assembly in Copenhagen. As a non-profit organization, we are responsible for delivering ISTQB certifications, accrediting trainers and training organizations, and promoting software testing excellence in Ivory Coast.
home.certification_wheel_description: Discover our portfolio of certifications and explore what will support your testing career.
home.istqb_intro: The ISTQB® International Software Testing Qualifications Board
home.istqb_description: founded in 1998, is the global reference for software testing certification. Since its inception, the ISTQB® Certified Tester program has greatly contributed to professionalizing the software testing field by establishing internationally recognized standards. Its mission is to support the testing community and promote software quality on a global scale.
home.how_to_certify_desc: Discover key information and download syllabi and sample exams from our free knowledge base.
home.find_training_desc: Identify exam providers in your region that offer the certification exam you have selected.

cta.savings_description: We don't just help you get certified—we help you grow. Our certified professionals enjoy enhanced career opportunities, with international recognition and valued expertise.

cta_two.title: Ready to get your ISTQB certification?
cta_two.description: Join the community of certified testers in Ivory Coast. Register today to take your exam or contact us for more information.

citl.hero_title: The ISTQB Certification Body in Ivory Coast
citl.hero_description: The Ivorian Software Testing Committee (CITL) is the only official structure in Ivory Coast responsible for representing and promoting ISTQB. We deliver ISTQB certifications, accredit trainers and actively participate in international software testing standards.
citl.overview_description: The Ivorian Software Testing Committee (CITL) was founded on **October 24, 2025** at the **ISTQB (International Software Testing Qualification Board)** general assembly in Copenhagen, Denmark. As a **non-profit organization**, it remains the **only official structure in Ivory Coast** responsible for representing and promoting ISTQB. In this capacity, CITL **delivers ISTQB certifications**, **independently accredits trainers** and training organizations, and **actively participates in ISTQB® activities**.
citl.overview_item_2: Benefit from training provided by accredited organizations
citl.overview_item_3: Join a community of certified testers
citl.overview_item_4: Develop your skills according to international standards
citl.takeaway_1: CITL is the only official ISTQB body in Ivory Coast
citl.takeaway_2: We offer 6 certification levels for all profiles
citl.takeaway_3: Our certifications are recognized in over 120 countries
citl.conclusion: CITL is committed to promoting software testing excellence in Ivory Coast. By joining our community, you gain access to globally recognized certifications, quality training, and a network of qualified professionals.

istqb.hero_description: ISTQB is the global reference for software testing certification, founded in 1998. Its mission is to support the testing community and promote software quality on a global scale.
istqb.overview_description: The **International Software Testing Qualifications Board (ISTQB®)** is the **world leader** in software testing certifications. Founded in **1998**, it has established **internationally recognized standards** that help professionalize the software testing field. ISTQB operates through **national member boards** in **over 120 countries**, ensuring global consistency while adapting to local needs. The **ISTQB® Certified Tester program** has become the **industry standard**, with millions of certifications delivered worldwide.
istqb.overview_item_3: Continuously updated syllabi and best practices
istqb.overview_item_4: Multi-level certification path for career growth
istqb.takeaway_1: ISTQB certifications are recognized by employers worldwide
istqb.takeaway_2: Structured learning paths from foundation to expert level
istqb.takeaway_3: Access to a global community of testing professionals
istqb.conclusion: ISTQB provides the framework for professional software testing excellence. Whether you're starting your testing career or advancing to expert level, ISTQB certifications demonstrate your commitment to quality and professional standards.

vision.hero_description: To be the leading force in promoting software quality and testing excellence across Ivory Coast and the broader African region.
vision.overview_description: CITL envisions becoming the **cornerstone of software testing excellence** in Ivory Coast and a **model for the African region**. We aim to **elevate the software testing profession** by establishing high standards, fostering a culture of quality, and creating pathways for professional growth. Our vision extends beyond certifications – we seek to **transform the perception of software testing** from a technical necessity to a **strategic business enabler**. By building partnerships with industry, academia, and government, we strive to create an **ecosystem where quality is valued** and testing professionals are recognized as key contributors to technological advancement.
vision.overview_item_1: Establish Ivory Coast as a hub for software testing excellence
vision.overview_item_2: Create pathways for continuous professional development
vision.overview_item_3: Foster collaboration between industry and education
vision.overview_item_4: Promote quality culture across all technology sectors
vision.takeaway_1: Position CITL as the reference for software testing in West Africa
vision.takeaway_2: Develop local expertise aligned with international standards
vision.takeaway_3: Create opportunities for knowledge sharing and innovation
vision.conclusion: Our vision drives every initiative we undertake. We believe that by investing in software testing excellence today, we're building a foundation for technological innovation and economic growth tomorrow. Join us in making this vision a reality.
vision.missions_description: CITL is committed to several strategic missions to promote and develop the software testing profession in Ivory Coast.
vision.mission_1: CITL is responsible for **establishing a reliable, consistent and transparent accreditation system**, aimed at accrediting trainers and training organizations.
vision.mission_2: CITL raises awareness of the importance of testing by organizing **workshops, seminars and events** on professional practices and standards.
vision.mission_3: We offer **ISTQB certifying training**, covering different levels to train qualified professionals capable of ensuring software quality in business.
vision.mission_4: We organize and deliver **exams and certifications** for software testers.
vision.mission_5: We work to build an **active and dynamic testing community**, setting up working groups and encouraging the exchange of best practices.
vision.mission_6: Beyond certification, CITL aims to promote a **culture of quality** in Ivorian organizations, fostering continuous improvement for the success of their IT projects.

missions.hero_description: CITL's missions focus on delivering certifications, building capacity, and fostering a community dedicated to software quality excellence.
missions.overview_description: As the **official ISTQB representative** in Ivory Coast, CITL carries out critical missions that support the software testing community. We **administer ISTQB certification exams** across all levels, ensuring adherence to international standards. We **accredit training providers and instructors**, guaranteeing quality education for certification candidates. Beyond certifications, we **organize events, workshops, and knowledge-sharing sessions** to keep the community engaged with emerging trends and best practices. We also **advocate for software quality** with stakeholders in government, industry, and academia, promoting the value of professional testing in digital transformation initiatives.
missions.overview_item_4: Advocate for quality and testing standards
missions.takeaway_2: Building capacity through accredited training programs
missions.takeaway_3: Creating a vibrant community of practice
missions.conclusion: Our missions are designed to serve the testing community at every level – from aspiring testers seeking their first certification to experienced professionals pursuing expert-level credentials. Through our work, we're building infrastructure for software quality excellence.

members.hero_description: Become a member of the Ivorian Software Testing Committee and actively participate in promoting testing excellence in Ivory Coast.
members.why_join_description: By becoming a CITL member, you join a community of professionals dedicated to software testing excellence. You benefit from exclusive advantages and actively participate in developing the profession in Ivory Coast.
members.benefit_1: Access to exclusive events and training organized by CITL
members.benefit_2: Participation in working groups and community initiatives
members.benefit_4: Networking with testing professionals in Ivory Coast
members.benefit_5: Opportunities to contribute to international standards via ISTQB
members.benefit_6: Privileged access to technical resources and documentation
members.benefit_7: Participation in strategic decisions during general assemblies
members.benefit_8: Professional recognition within the testing community
members.takeaway_1: Be part of a dynamic community of testing professionals
members.takeaway_2: Contribute to the development and recognition of the profession
members.takeaway_3: Benefit from exclusive advantages and growth opportunities
members.conclusion: By becoming a CITL member, you're not just joining an organization - you're becoming an agent of change in the software testing ecosystem in Ivory Coast. Together, we're building a strong, internationally recognized community.

executive_board.hero_description: Meet the dedicated professionals guiding CITL's mission to promote software testing excellence in Ivory Coast.
executive_board.overview_description: The CITL Executive Board brings together **experienced professionals** from diverse backgrounds in software testing, quality assurance, and technology management. Board members are **elected by CITL members** and serve **defined terms** to ensure fresh perspectives and continuity. The Board is responsible for **strategic direction**, **policy development**, and **operational oversight** of all CITL activities. Members participate in **ISTQB international meetings**, ensuring CITL remains aligned with global standards while addressing local needs. The Board operates with **transparency and accountability**, reporting regularly to the membership and stakeholders.
executive_board.overview_item_3: Represent CITL at national and international forums
executive_board.takeaway_1: Committed to transparency and member engagement
executive_board.takeaway_2: Experienced professionals with proven track records
executive_board.takeaway_3: Dedicated to serving the testing community
executive_board.conclusion: The Executive Board's leadership ensures that CITL remains focused on its mission while adapting to evolving needs of the software testing community. Board members volunteer their time and expertise to advance the profession and create opportunities for all members.

why_certification.hero_description: ISTQB® certifications are **globally recognized** and serve as proof of competence and expertise in software testing. They open career opportunities and enhance your professional profile.
why_certification.content_description:
High-Quality Training Programs

All syllabi (programs) are developed and reviewed by recognized testing professionals from both academia and industry.

Global Recognition

Certifications are recognized internationally through the consistent application of ISTQB® policies and procedures by its member boards.

Common Language

The ISTQB® glossary provides a shared vocabulary for the entire profession.

Public Access

The glossary and syllabi of ISTQB® are freely accessible on the official ISTQB® website and on member board sites, in different local languages.

Continuous Improvement

Syllabi and other documents are constantly updated to meet the needs of organizations worldwide and to keep pace with the evolution of the profession.

Professional Credibility

Being certified offers benefits for both individuals and organizations, ensuring that testing professionals meet the high standards established by ISTQB®.
why_certification.benefits_subtitle: ISTQB® is the international standard for software testing certification. Discover the benefits for professionals, employers, and accredited training organizations.
why_certification.benefit_1_description:
ISTQB® is the international standard for software testing certification. Whether you are new to testing or have several years of experience, obtaining an ISTQB® certification offers considerable advantages:
  • Independent, internationally recognized validation of skills, trusted by employers.
  • Portable proof of your abilities, valid for your current job and future career opportunities.
  • Career progression support through continuous improvement of your testing skills.
why_certification.benefit_2_description:
ISTQB® certification offers significant benefits to companies by supporting recruitment, retention, and development of testing professionals within the organization:
  • Competitive advantage: By strengthening customer confidence through better reliability of developed applications, made possible by effective and economical testing practices.
  • Service enhancement: Consulting companies with certified staff can offer higher-level services to their clients, increasing revenue and reputation.
  • Common language: Establishing shared vocabulary and understanding of testing throughout the organization, promoting collaboration and improved work practices.
  • Access to the ISTQB® Partnership Program: Allowing additional development and recognition opportunities.
why_certification.benefit_3_description:
Educational institutions and consulting companies can become an ISTQB® Accredited Training Provider in accordance with internationally defined processes and rules. Obtaining this accreditation offers significant advantages:
  • Enhanced reassurance and credibility with current and future clients.
  • Superior quality training through certified trainers and verification by an ISTQB® member board of content quality and syllabus coverage in training materials.
  • Advance notification of changes to syllabi and the ISTQB® Glossary.
  • Authorized use of ISTQB® logos and the possibility of being referenced on the official ISTQB® website.
why_certification.certification_scheme_description: Software testing has become an essential and increasingly recognized skill in the field of software development. As software quality is crucial for customer satisfaction and business performance, professional testing plays a key role in delivering reliable and secure products.
why_certification.certification_scheme_content: The ISTQB® Certified-Tester program is an internationally recognized training and certification framework, standardized for software testers. It includes several levels:
why_certification.exam_organization_description: Exams are offered and administered by training organizations mandated by CITL.
why_certification.global_success_description: The Certified-Tester certification has achieved great success internationally. As of April 2025, more than one million professionals worldwide are certified.
why_certification.candidate_sectors_description: Certified professionals come from various sectors, including:

understanding.title: Understanding ISTQB® Exams
understanding.description: ISTQB® exams are designed to assess your real software testing skills. They combine theoretical and practical questions to ensure candidates master essential professional testing concepts.

administration.title: ISTQB® Exam Administration
administration.provider_intro: ISTQB® exams are administered in Côte d'Ivoire by the
administration.provider_details: through iSQI, its accredited exam provider.
administration.organization_contact: If you are an organization wishing to arrange an exam for a considerable number of your employees, please contact the
administration.organization_details: to explore the possibility of organizing an in-house exam.
administration.consistency_note: ISTQB® exams are organized consistently worldwide and are based on a precisely defined number of questions, varying depending on the certification level.

format.title: Exam Format by Module
format.note_duration: The non-native language exam duration applies to candidates whose mother tongue is not the language of the exam.
format.note_essay: Expert exams include an essay part in addition to multiple choice questions.
format.note_standards: All exams are organized according to international ISTQB® standards.

level_format.title: Exam Format by Level
level_format.description: Each ISTQB® certification level has its own exam characteristics, tailored to the complexity of the skills being assessed.

foundation.subtitle: Foundation Level
foundation.content: 40 questions in 60 minutes, required score: 26/40 (65%). Multiple choice and multiple response questions.

anti_piracy.hero_description: The popularity and recognition of the ISTQB scheme worldwide have become so high, that counterfeit certificates are now in circulation.
anti_piracy.warning_text: The popularity and recognition of the ISTQB scheme worldwide have become so high, that counterfeit certificates are now in circulation.
anti_piracy.verification_text: To verify the authenticity of your Training Provider, Exam Provider and Certificate, or if you are suspicious about the way any training or exams are conducted, please contact CITL, providing details of the certificate and of the Exam/Training Provider.
anti_piracy.verify_training_provider: The authenticity of your Training Provider
anti_piracy.verify_exam_provider: The legitimacy of your Exam Provider
anti_piracy.verify_certificate: The validity of your ISTQB Certificate
anti_piracy.contact_text: To verify the authenticity of your Training Provider, Exam Provider and Certificate, or if you are suspicious about the way any training or exams are conducted, please contact CITL, providing details of the certificate and of the Exam/Training Provider.
anti_piracy.footer_note: Protect the value of your certification by verifying its authenticity with CITL

training.hero_title: Apply as an ISTQB Accredited Training Provider
training.hero_description: Join the network of CITL accredited training providers. Deliver quality ISTQB training and benefit from our professional support.
training.intro_title: Why Become an Accredited Training Provider?
training.intro_description: Training Providers create and deliver training that comply with the ISTQB syllabi content. The requirements for training providers are defined in the CITL Accreditation Process.
training.benefit_1: Usage of the "Accredited Training Provider" logo
training.benefit_2: Being listed on the List of CITL Accredited Training Providers and ISTQB List of Training Providers
training.benefit_3: Providing a continuously expanding professional development path to their clients in the field of testing
training.benefit_4: Independent assessment of the professionalism of their trainers
training.benefit_5: Independent assessment of the quality and coverage of their training material
training.benefit_6: Participation in early reviews of the ISTQB syllabi and in other activities organized by CITL and ISTQB
training.form_description: All fields are required unless marked as optional. Please provide accurate information about your organization.
training.training_facilities_placeholder: Describe your training facilities, equipment, and learning environment...
training.additional_info_placeholder: Any additional information about your organization, certifications, or experience...
training.accreditation_success: Accreditation request submitted successfully! We will contact you soon.
training.accreditation_error: Error submitting request. Please check the information provided.
training.process_description: The accreditation process by CITL is a rigorous and structured process, involving several key actors:
training.process_step_1: Our partner GASQ: a certifying body recognized by ISTQB®, responsible for managing contractual aspects.
training.process_step_2: The panel of experts: responsible for validating educational content in accordance with ISTQB® recommendations.
training.process_step_3: The CITL board: which supervises and coordinates the entire accreditation process.
